description.fr: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Les bêtises infligent {value:dmg} dégats aux adversaires autour\_.
description.en: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} The Troublemakers do {value:dmg} damage to surrounding\_ opponents.
description.es: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Las tonterías infligen {value:dmg} de daño a los adversarios de alrededor\_.
description.de: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Die Dummheiten fügen Gegnern um sich herum\_ {value:dmg} Schaden zu.
description.pt: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} As encrencas infligem {value:dmg} de danos aos adversários em\_volta\_.
